meta.content: Corrections; Books; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

abstract.p: Correction of Oct 12 article about finalists for National Book Awards, regarding career of one finalist

block.p: An article yesterday about the finalists for the National Book Awards referred incorrectly to the career of one finalist. David Levering Lewis, who was named for his biography ''W. E. B. Du Bois: The Fight for Equality and the American Century, 1919-1963,'' has written nine other books, including the first volume of the Du Bois work, for which he won the Pulitzer Prize for biography in 1994; he is not a first-time author.

An article yesterday about the finalists for the National Book Awards referred incorrectly to the career of one finalist. David Levering Lewis, who was named for his biography ''W. E. B.
